# Biological endpoints

The ADCC luciferase assay tested the presence of vaccine-induced antibody responses in serum samples collected from the study participants against Infectious Molecular Clone (IMC)-infected target cells by measuring percent reduction in Relative Luminescence Units (RLUs) over a series of dilutions of the serum (@103389fimmu201902741).
